The CSS language is fantastic at adding style to a webpage, and now adding animation to your site has never been easier. Just recently I discovered a great library of CSS animations by Daniel Eden, this library contains 36 different animations that can be easily added to you projects.

I have set up a page on CSSPortal so that you can view each animation at a click of the button, check out all the css animations. You can also download Daniel Eden’s library at github.

Lets have a look at a few animations below.

1. Pulse

2. shake

3. bounceIn

4. fadeOut

Well that’s just a few animations from the library, be sure to check out all the animations over at our new page – css animations.
